metadata.Title: CVE-2020-23334 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: A WRITE memory access in the AP4_NullTerminatedStringAtom::AP4_NullTerminatedStringAtom component of Bento4 version 06c39d9 can lead to a segmentation fault.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
